text: The Ram Pickup (previously Dodge Ram) is a full-size pickup truck made by Chrysler. They used to be made by Dodge. The name Ram was first used in 1981 on the redesigned Dodge trucks. These trucks are named for a ram hood ornament. Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Dodge Ram
